verses.verse: Come <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> O <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H776>ground:<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3678>throne,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H7390>tender<s%> and <S%H6028>delicate.<s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> the <S%H7347>millstones,<s%> and <S%H2912>grind<s%> <S%H7058>meal:<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> thy <S%H6777>locks,<s%> make <S%H2834>bare<s%> the <S%H7640>leg,<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H7785>thigh,<s%> pass <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>

Thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> shall be <S%H1540>uncovered,<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> thy <S%H2781>shame<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen:<s%> I will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> and I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6293>meet<s%> thee as a <S%H120>man.<s%>
As for our <S%H1350>redeemer,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name,<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Sit <S%H3427><s%> thou <S%H1748>silent,<s%> and <S%H935>get<s%> thee into <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> be <S%H7121>called,<s%> The <S%H1404>lady<s%> of <S%H4467>kingdoms.<s%>

I was <S%H7107>wroth<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> I have <S%H2490>polluted<s%> mine <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> them into thine <S%H3027>hand:<s%> thou didst <S%H7760>show<s%> them <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7356>mercy;<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2205>ancient<s%> hast thou <S%H3966>very<s%> heavily <S%H3513>laid<s%> thy <S%H5923>yoke.<s%>

And thou <S%H559>saidst,<s%> I shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H1404>lady<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> so <S%H5704>that<s%> thou didst <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things <S%H5921>to<s%> thy <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> didst <S%H2142>remember<s%> the latter <S%H319>end<s%> of it.

Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> thou that art given to <S%H5719>pleasures,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> <S%H983>carelessly,<s%> that <S%H559>sayest<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am, and none else <S%H657>beside<s%> <S%H5750><s%> me; I shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> as a <S%H490>widow,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> the loss of children: <S%H7908><s%>

But <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> things shall <S%H935>come<s%> to thee in a <S%H7281>moment<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> the loss of <S%H7908>children,<s%> and <S%H489>widowhood:<s%> they shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee in their <S%H8537>perfection<s%> for the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H3785>sorceries,<s%> and for the <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H6109>abundance<s%> of thine <S%H2267>enchantments.<s%>

For thou hast <S%H982>trusted<s%> in thy <S%H7451>wickedness:<s%> thou hast <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H369>None<s%> <S%H7200>seeth<s%> me. Thy <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and thy <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> hath <S%H7725>perverted<s%> thee; and thou hast <S%H559>said<s%> in thine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am, and none else <S%H657>beside<s%> <S%H5750><s%> me.

Therefore shall <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee; thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> from whence it <S%H7837>riseth:<s%> and <S%H1943>mischief<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee; thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3201>able<s%> to put it <S%H3722>off:<s%> and <S%H7722>desolation<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee <S%H6597>suddenly,<s%> which thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>know.<s%>

Stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> with thine <S%H2267>enchantments,<s%> and with the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H3785>sorceries,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> thou hast <S%H3021>labored<s%> from thy <S%H4480>youth;<s%> <S%H5271><s%> if so <S%H194>be<s%> thou shalt be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3276>profit,<s%> if so <S%H194>be<s%> thou mayest <S%H6206>prevail.<s%>

Thou art <S%H3811>wearied<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H6098>counsels.<s%> Let <S%H4994>now<s%> the <S%H1895>astrologers,<s%> <S%H8064><s%> the <S%H2372>stargazers,<s%> <S%H3556><s%> the <S%H2320>monthly<s%> <S%H3045>prognosticators,<s%> stand <S%H5975>up,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> thee from these things <S%H4480>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H7179>stubble;<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> them; they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5315>themselves<s%> from the <S%H4480>power<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H3852>flame:<s%> there shall <S%H369>not<s%> be a <S%H1513>coal<s%> to <S%H2552>warm<s%> at, nor <S%H217>fire<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> it.

Thus <S%H3651><s%> shall they <S%H1961>be<s%> unto thee with <S%H834>whom<s%> thou hast <S%H3021>labored,<s%> even thy <S%H5503>merchants,<s%> from thy <S%H4480>youth:<s%> <S%H5271><s%> they shall <S%H8582>wander<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H5676>quarter;<s%> <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H3467>save<s%> thee.
